citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 AM on 13-SEP-
2021. Inspectors arrived at 9:30 AM at the facility site (shared with another registrant) and spoke with an office manager
from the neighboring registrant who is familiar with the facility and it's representatives. The office manager attempted to
contact representatives from the facility by phone and was unsuccessful. Inspectors were available at the site to conduct
an inspection until 12:30 PM. No contact was made with any facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
JOHN LOPINTO, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
